name: Chat Em Up
description:
Chat Em Up is a game made for twitch streamers to play with their chat.

Try to survive the enemies your chat sends to you. You can run or fight them.

This is a beta version of the game by now it has three enemies, two of them spawns normally, the other one can be spawned using channel points.

Configuration:

The streamer can configure multiple things about the game:

  • Twitch channel name.
  • Max amount of enemies.
  • General cooldown between spawns.
  • Per player cooldown.
  • Amount of enemies spawned by each command.
Game: Player:

Player can move using WASD keys.

He can also dash using Shift key.

       

Player does a melee attack when pressing E.

He can stab using Q.

Player shoots with R and F keys.

Enemies:

You have two classes of enemies.

Default:

It moves towards the player to hit him. There are two versions of this one. This enemy is spawned using the !spawn command.

 
Channel Points Poss:

This enemy walks near the player, shoots its arm and runs away. He also runs when player is too near. It is too heavy to hace knockback.

To allow this enemy you need a custom reward in which user might insert !spawnb command.

Future Plans:
  • New personalized designs & sounds.
  • Ammo system.
  • Enemies special attacks.
  • Difficulty increase.
  • More bosses & enemies.
  • Custom enemy name tags for each boss.
